fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you follow a player, you will scare one of their visitors away.

- You will only be informed if you scare away a Neutral Killing role, or a member of the Mafia performing the factional Mafia kill. Your target will also be informed that they were protected.

- You may stay at your own house to scare a visitor away once.

- You will automatically scare away any visitors you have scared away on a previous night. This will not count against your original priority or visitor limit.
